Title: CWA-2024-006: wasmd non-deterministic module_query_safe query
Description:
**Component:** wasmd
**Criticality:** Medium ([ACMv1](https://github.com/interchainio/security/blob/main/resources/CLASSIFICATION_MATRIX.md): I:Moderate; L:Likely)
**Patched versions:** wasmd 0.53.0

See [CWA-2024-006](https://github.com/CosmWasm/advisories/blob/main/CWAs/CWA-2024-006.md) for more details.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 0.52.0 before 0.53.0, version 0.52.0
